library.title: The Great Gatsby
library.description: Set in the Jazz Age on Long Island, the novel tells the story of the mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby and his obsession with the beautiful former debutante Daisy Buchanan.
library.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

library.title: The Godfather
library.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
library.cast: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

library.title: National Geographic
library.description: Monthly magazine known for its photography, cartography, and reports about history, science, geography, and world culture.

library.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
library.description: The story of a young girl confronting deep-seated prejudice in her community, exploring themes of racial inequality and moral growth.
library.author: Harper Lee

library.title: The Shawshank Redemption
library.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

library.title: Clean Code
library.description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship that helps programmers write cleaner, more maintainable code.
library.author: Robert C. Martin
